meanings.definition: A person who is against the use of marijuana.
meanings.sent1: The antipot spoke out against the dangers of marijuana.
meanings.sent2: The antipot attended the rally to protest the legalization of marijuana.
meanings.sent3: The antipot joked that they would rather eat broccoli than smoke weed.
meanings.sent4: She was an antipot, viewing marijuana as a gateway to trouble.
meanings.sent5: The antipot's strong stance against marijuana made them stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: Opposed to the legalization or use of marijuana.
meanings.sent1: The antipot group campaigned against the legalization of marijuana.
meanings.sent2: Her antipot views on marijuana made her unpopular among her friends.
meanings.sent3: He humorously referred to himself as the antipot guy at the party.
meanings.sent4: The antipot sentiment in the town was evident in the lack of cannabis shops.
meanings.sent5: The antipot argument was strong, citing health risks and legal concerns.
